## postgres.PreloadedPostgresImageProps.mockDataPath property

Path to a sql file with both schema and data to load into the database

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mockDataPath: string;
```

## Remarks

This data can be produced by standing up a postgres instance, populating it with the required data and then running [pg\_dump](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.1/app-pgdump.html)<!-- -->.
